name: loop
desc: The loop module iterates an operation. For example, you could use a loop object to control the movement of an object in your application; such as incrementing the movement of a slider for a slice plane..

properties.name: Loop
properties.desc: The Loop controls setting the Current Value by specified increments.

properties.name: Starting Value
properties.desc: The Starting Value is the beginning value for the simulation.

properties.name: Ending Value
properties.desc: The Ending Value is the end value for the simulation.

properties.name: Step Size
properties.desc: The Step Size value specifies a factor for the increment for advancement when stepping or running.
